item.title: NAMAKORIUM launches in Early Access on January 30
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Underwater cooperative real-time strategy game dated.

Underwater cooperative real-time strategy game NAMAKORIUM will launch in Early Access or PC via Steam on January 30 for 1,500 yen, developer Polyscape announced. A launch discount price of 1,200 yen will be available for a limited time.

The Early Access version significantly expands upon the content from the previously released demo, featuring a total of eight stages with varying difficulty levels. A new Random Match feature allows players to enjoy cooperative play even when playing solo. The game will continue to be updated towards its full release, incorporating player feedback.

Polyscape also launched a Campfire crowdfunding campaign seeking 500,000 yen (approx. $3,177 USD) to expand NAMAKORIUM as a global intellectual property through plushies, figures, and more. The campaign was inspired by player feedback from the demo, such as ‚ÄúThe Namakos are cute‚Äù and ‚ÄúI want merchandise.‚Äù The money raised will be used to mass produce plushies and figures, as well as fund international public relations efforts. This intellectual property and global expansion will proceed in parallel with the Early Access launch.

Here is an overview of the game, via Polyscape:

About

NAMAKORIUM is a chaotic, cooperative multiplayer real-time strategy for up to four players. Command the ‚Äúsea cleaners‚Äù‚ÄîNamakos (sea cucumbers) left behind by humanity‚Äîand clean up the polluted oceans!

Can you reclaim the beautiful sea? It‚Äôs all up to your planning skills, your friends, and your trusty sea cucumbers. Get ready for a frantic, action-packed ocean cleanup operation!

Organize Your Namako Operation

Command unique Namakos, gather resources, construct buildings, and clear paths‚Äîthe tasks are many and time is short.
Purify all the pollution before the food runs out!

Will your strategy hold up under pressure and succeed with the team?

Unique Namakos with Special Traits

Shell Namako gathers limestone. Iron Namako is great at mining. Flame Namako and Ice Namako can survive extreme temperatures.

Use their distinct abilities to assign roles and conquer each stage together!

Restore the Ocean‚Äôs Beauty

As you decontaminate, corals bloom, sunlight shines through, and the ocean regains vibrant color.

Over 40 types of ‚ÄúScenic Creatures‚Äù will begin to swim in‚Äîtry to collect them all as you heal the seas!

Beware the ‚ÄúBlight Namako‚Äù!

During cleanup, corrupted Namako known as ‚ÄúBlight Namako‚Äù may suddenly appear.

They rot your food and drag the ocean back into darkness.

Team up and repel them with the mighty Namako Fusion Cannon!

Key Features

  • Planning x Real-Time Strategy Gameplay ‚Äì Strategize based on map structure and control multiple cucumbers simultaneously
  • Chaotic Cooperative Play ‚Äì Plans may succeed‚Ä¶ or hilariously fail‚Äîevery match brings its own story
  • Online Multiplayer ‚Äì Join with friends or random players via ‚ÄúFriend Match‚Äù or ‚ÄúRandom Match.‚Äù
  • Over 40 Scenic Creatures ‚Äì Discover real and fantasy species as you play.
  • Eight unique stages.
  • Stage titles based on clear time.
  • Adorable sea cucumbers a a hidden post-apocalyptic worldview.
  • More stages, gimmicks, and creatures are planned in future updates!

item.title: The Brew Barons now available for PS5
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Porco Rosso-inspired arcade flight simulation game.

Lifetap Studios has released a PlayStation 5 version of Porco Rosso-inspired open-world arcade flight simulation game The Brew Barons via PlayStation Store for $21.99, the developer announced.

The Brew Barons first launched for PC via Steam on March 1, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Lifetap Studios:

About

A tranquil world becomes ever more corrupt by the day, spoiled by a strong-armed pirate organization that forcefully impose their brewing monopoly over the lands. Armed with your own brewery and seaplane, it‚Äôs up to you to explore, forage, craft, sell and deliver your handcrafted brews with aid from fellow pilots who‚Äôve joined your cause to overthrow the corrupt pirate organization and restore peace.

Key Features

  • Assemble your plane from a variety of parts, each with their own traits.
  • Chose your pilot and copilot of whom have strengths and weaknesses.
  • Explore the world in search of ingredients to bring back to your brewery.
  • Pick and choose which foraged ingredients to blend.
  • Distill and / or Ferment, each producing a different outcome.
  • Design and name your bottle to your liking.
  • Design your very own bar to sell your brews and bring fame to your establishment!
  • With fame comes special delivery orders from other bars to stock your brew.

item.title: LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories ‚Äì Nintendo Switch 2 Edition launches April 30 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A 1,100 yen upgrade from the Switch version.

LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories ‚Äì Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will launch on April 30 in Japan for 7,590 yen, developer Dragami Games announced. Users who own the Switch version will be able to upgrade via an ‚ÄúUpgrade Pack‚Äù for 1,100 yen.

LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories first launched for Switch in Japan and PC via GOG worldwide on November 27, 2025. The PC version is also available via DLsite in Japan.

Here is an overview of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, via Dragami Games:

In the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, the maximum number of characters that can be photographed simultaneously in PRO Photo Session has been expanded from two to up to seven characters. Visual quality and frame rate have also been enhanced to take full advantage of Nintendo Switch 2 hardware, delivering a smoother and higher-quality photography experience. Mouse-style controls using Joy-Con 2 are supported throughout the game for intuitive operation.

An Upgrade Pack is planned for players who already own the Nintendo Switch version. Existing save data and downloadable content can be used seamlessly, allowing players to continue their experience without interruption.

The physical edition includes a first-print bonus downloadable content costume, ‚ÄúRace Queen‚Äù (working title). A preliminary design visual is being revealed for the first time. Look forward to this sporty, stylish, and sexy new costume.

item.title: Duskfade ‚ÄòGameplay‚Äô trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Shatter the shackles of time.

Publisher Fireshine Games and developer Weird Beluga Studio have released a new gameplay trailer for 3D action platformer Duskfade.

Here is an overview of the game, via Fireshine Games:

A nostalgic 3D action-platformer inspired by the golden era of PS2 is capturing the attention of fans and creators alike.

Duskfade is an upcoming 3D action-platformer inspired by the golden age of PlayStation games, drawing clear influence from classics like Jak and Daxter, Ratchet & Clank, and Kingdom Hearts. Built with modern technology but rooted in old-school design, Duskfade blends fast-paced platforming, expressive worlds, and stylish combat into a heartfelt throwback adventure.

Designed as a love letter to players who grew up on PlayStation, Duskfade taps directly into the nostalgia of the PS2 era while delivering the polish and fluidity expected from today‚Äôs action games. It‚Äôs a title aimed squarely at fans who miss when colorful, story-driven platformers were at the core of the PlayStation identity.

The game was recently featured in the New Game Plus Showcase, where a brand- new gameplay trailer and boss fight footage were revealed. The appearance was met with strong enthusiasm and positive reactions from major YouTube and Twitch creators.

Players don‚Äôt have to wait to experience it for themselves. A playable demo is currently available on Steam, holding a 91% positive rating, giving fans an early taste of Duskfade‚Äôs world, movement, and combat.

Duskfade is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in 2026.

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves teases Fist of the North Star collaboration
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Kenshiro to join the fray?

SNK has released a short animated video teasing a collaboration between Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves and Fist of the North Star.

The video shows a boy and a girl about to be attacked by two thugs, before a mysterious person saves them using just his finger. The thugs are reminiscent of the villain characters in Fist of the North Star, and the finger-press sound is reminiscent of the pressure-point sound used in the anime. The mysterious character‚Äôs leg and arm also match the design of Kenshiro, the protagonist of Fist of the North Star.

SNK has previously posted similar animated teasers featuring Wolfgang Krauser (in English and Japanese), as well as Mr. Karate and Robert Garcia, so it is possible these animated trailers are intended to tease new downloadable characters for Season 2, which begins in January.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: Shadow of the Road launches in 2026
item.content:encoded:
Story-driven turn-based RPG Shadow of the Road will launch for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, smf GOG in 2026, publisher Owlcat Games and developer Another Angle announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Owlcat Games:

About

Shadow of the Road is a story-driven, turn-based RPG where feudal Japan meets magic and machine. Assemble your team from a diverse set of characters and test your skills against y≈çkai and steampunk contraptions. Carve your own path through an immersive story and change the very fate of the Empire.

Step into 1868 Japan, a land fiercely divided by a brutal civil war between the traditionalist forces of Shogun Tokugawa and the technologically superior army of Emperor Mutsuhito, backed by the British East Nippon Company. Amidst this turmoil, warriors, spies, and mystical beings navigate a world where magic and machinery intertwine, the jarring contrast of tradition and technology permeating even the landscape, where weathered, ancient temples stand alongside towering steam-powered machines. Experience a country at a pivotal crossroads, torn between its cherished ancient heritage and the relentless march of modernization. Which side will emerge victorious? The fate of Japan hangs in the balance.

Your Story, Your Choices

Take part in a daring mission led by Tokugawa‚Äôs own spymaster, who has recruited the r≈çnin, Satoru and Akira, to protect a mysterious boy with immense, uncontrollable powers. Throughout their arduous journey, new heroes will join their cause, each with their own past and motivations. Together, they will confront tremendous and ever-growing dangers, striving to reclaim their honor and change the course of history. Every choice you make will guide your characters along unique and captivating paths: form new bonds, sever lifelong friendships, or mend fractured family ties. Your decisions will shape who they become.

Different Characters

Take on the role of master strategist as you guide your band of warriors in both combat and conscience. Each character has a variety of backgrounds and skills, as well as their own motivations, desires, and fears‚Ä¶ Build a team that compliments your preferred tactics and your personality.

Combat

Experience classic, turn-based combat with a samurai-tactics flare. Each team member brings their own distinctive set of skills and abilities to the battlefield. Even their personal goals and relationships influence every encounter. If you can master these social and strategic dynamics, then you and your team will no doubt dominate the battlefield.

item.title: Nested Lands launches in Early Access for PC on January 23
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Survival settlement RPG dated.

Survival settlement RPG Nested Lands will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG, on January 23, META Publishing and developer 1 Million Bits Horde announced. Console versions are planned for the full release.

Here is an overview of the game, via META Publishing:

Nested Lands is a medieval survival-settlement RPG set during the Black Death. Players start with nothing and must work to build a functioning village by gathering resources, enduring nasty plague outbreaks, and protecting their people from roaming bandits and unstable plague-twisted foes. Every choice affects the settlement‚Äôs future, and the world in-game reacts to the player‚Äôs choices accordingly. Between the responsibilities that come with leading a village, surviving a deadly outbreak, and the question of the main character‚Äôs own mental state and personal hygiene, what could go wrong?

The Early Access version brings an expanded set of mechanics shaped by community feedback:

  • A deeper plague system with multiple stages and tactical consequences.
  • Reworked combat and stealth.
  • Smarter villagers, improved management tools, and clearer automation.
  • A broad set of quality-of-life improvements across building, user interface, and progression.

In the coming weeks, players will be able to check out the updated demo, which features cooperative mode for up to four players, allowing them to explore a slice of the game‚Äôs world before its release.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: SAND: Raiders of Sophie launches in March for PS5 and PC, later for Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Open-world extraction shooter gets a release window.

Open-world player-versus-player-versus-environment extraction shooter SAND: Raiders of Sophie will launch for PlayStation 5 and and PC via Steam in March, followed by Xbox Series at a later date, publisher tinyBuild and developers Hologryph and TowerHaus announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via tinyBuild:

About

SAND: Raiders of Sophie is an open-world player-versus-player-versus-environment extraction shooter where players operate giant walkers across the post-apocalyptic dunes of a fallen planet. Battle rival players, explore, loot and extract valuable resources in a hostile, ever-changing world.

In order to effectively traverse this harsh and dangerous planet, you will design and deploy Tramplers, gigantic walking bases that will shield you from the elements, defend you and your loot against other players and destroy anything that obstructs your pursuit of becoming the most notorious pirate upon the dunes!

Key Features

  • Build, Customize, and Command Gigantic Mechanical Walkers ‚Äì Tramplers, your most loyal companion, which you can build from the ground up, act as a mode of transport, a main base, primary storage, protection from the elements, and a most formidable weapon.
  • Thrilling First-Person Player-Versus-Player-Versus-Environment Combat ‚Äì Team up with a group of friends or enter the world solo and go head to head with other players and the undead former inhabitants of this hostile planet with a variety of weapons in frantic first-person combat, or weaponize and fortify your trampler and engage in massive-scale combat upon the dunes of Sophie.
  • Explore a Fallen Civilization, Loot, and Extract ‚Äì The cities left in ruin upon Sophie hold untold riches, but danger lurks around every corner. Sail the world, scour the abandoned streets, monuments, and wrecks, recover valuable loot, weapons, and resources, and fight off rival pirates before extracting with your spoils.

Watch a new trailer below.
